exclusion: Press and hold any key on the panel for 8 seconds or 3 clicks in quick succession.
inclusion: Press and hold any key on the panel for 8 seconds or 3 clicks in quick succession.
label: MH-S521
overview: Touch Panel Switch is a wall panel built-in with Z-Wave Plus module. With its stylish design and stable performance, the panel can be used to control house-hold electrical appliances like lamp, motor, coffee machine, TV set etc.
wakeup: The device can be manually woken with a button press on the device

category.label: Wall Switch
category.description: Any device attached to the wall that controls a binary status of something, for ex. a light switch

parameters.label: Power Failure State
parameters.description: switch will be off when powered again

options.label: not saved
saved
forbid ALL ON, forbid ALL OFF
forbid ALL ON, allow ALL OFF
allow ALL ON, forbid ALL OFF
allow ALL ON, allow ALL OFF

parameters.label: LED Backlit brightness level
parameters.overview:
• 0 - LED disabled
  • 1 - 10 Min level - max level

parameters.label: Key Mode
parameters.overview: This function works for corridor or stairwell situation.

options.label: single click to switch on/off status
Key default as off state
Key default as on state
hold >3s then key is on, and off once released
single click + hold >3s then key is on

parameters.label: Basic CC integration setting
parameters.overview:
This parameter works for integration with different gateways/systems. If you do not know how to use, keep as default. 

  • 0x00 "Basic Set" received，key 1 responds; "Basic Get" received，key 1 sends "Basic Report"; key 1 will not send unsolicited "Basic Report"（No Endpoint）to LifeLine Association
  • 0x01 "Basic Set" received，key 1 responds; "Basic Get" received，key 1 sends "Basic Report"; key 1 will send unsolicited "Basic Report"（No Endpoint）to LifeLine Association
  • 0x02 "Basic Set" received，all keys respond; "Basic Get" received，not reply "Basic Report"; All keys will not send unsolicited "Basic Report"（No Endpoint） to LifeLine Association
  • 0x03 "Basic Set" received，all keys respond; "Basic Get" received，key 1 sends "Basic Report"; All keys will not send unsolicited "Basic Report"（No Endpoint）to LifeLine Association

parameters.label: Scene respond
parameters.overview:
• 0x00: Scene respond disabled
  • Bit0: =1 Key1 respond scene
    • =0 Key1 not respond scene
  • Bit1: =1 Key2 respond scene
    • =0 Key2 not respond scene
  • Bit2: =1 Key3 respond scene
    • =0 Key3 not respond scene
  • Bit7:4 Rev

options.label: Scene activate function disabled
One click key1 always activate scene ID1
only activate scene ID1 when key1's relay open
only activate scene ID1 when key1's relay closed

parameters.label: Key1 Activate Scene ID
parameters.overview:
• 0x00 Scene ID is invalid and will not send scene activate command.
  • 1~255 Scene ID

parameters.label: Key1 Activate Scene Duration
parameters.overview:
• 0x00 Instantly
  • 0x01~0x7F: Dimming durations from 1 second (0x01) to 127 seconds (0x7F) in 1-second resolution
  • 0x80~0xFE: Specify dimming durations from 1 minute (0x80) to 127 minutes (0xFE) in 1-minute resolution.

options.label: Scene activate function disabled
always activate scene ID1
,only activate scene ID1 when key2's relay open
nly activate scene ID1 when key2's relay closed

parameters.label: Key2 Activate Scene ID
parameters.overview:
• 0x00 Scene ID is invalid and will not send scene activate command.
  • 1~255 Scene ID

parameters.label: Key2 Activate Scene Duration
parameters.overview:
• 0x00 Instantly
  • 0x01~0x7F: Dimming durations from 1 second (0x01) to 127 seconds (0x7F) in 1-second resolution
  • 0x80~0xFE: Specify dimming durations from 1 minute (0x80) to 127 minutes (0xFE) in 1-minute resolution

options.label: Scene activate function disabled
always activate scene ID1
only activate scene ID1 when key3's relay open
only activate scene ID1 when key3's relay closed

parameters.label: Key3 Activate Scene ID
parameters.overview:
• 0x00 Scene ID is invalid and will not send scene activate command.
  • 1~255 Scene ID

parameters.label: Key3 Activate Scene Duration
parameters.overview:
• 0x00 Instantly
  • 0x01~0x7F: Dimming durations from 1 second (0x01) to 127 seconds (0x7F) in 1-second resolution
  • 0x80~0xFE: Specify dimming durations from 1 minute (0x80) to 127 minutes (0xFE) in 1-minute resolution.

    • =0 Key2 not respond scene
